objectives.objective: Hi, I am Sudhananda Biswas, a .NET Developer(C#, ASP). I have been working on C# language since 2016. Working with ASP .NET has been 2 years passed since 2017 and still learning.

As a self-taught Developer, I always loves to stay connected with new technologies. Mean-while working with C# & .NET framework since 2015 and 1+ years in ASP.NET MVC makes me more comfortable as a Web Developer.
